KnowledgeItem.Title: DeployShardedMongoDbCluster
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for Configure Sharded MongoDB Cluster by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding data blocks in the Issue

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock DEPLOYSHARDEDMONGODBCLUSTER and the necessary information for successful completion of workflow

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks 
				TargetMachine=${DEPLOYSHARDEDMONGODBCLUSTER:TargetMachine}            
				TargetState=Created
				Host=${DEPLOYSHARDEDMONGODBCLUSTER:Host}
				User=${DEPLOYSHARDEDMONGODBCLUSTER:User}
				Lib=RUNCOMMAND
				Command='sudo mkdir -p ${DEPLOYSHARDEDMONGODBCLUSTER:Path} && sudo mongod --fork --syslog --configsvr --dbpath ${DEPLOYSHARDEDMONGODBCLUSTER:Path} --port ${DEPLOYSHARDEDMONGODBCLUSTER:ConfigServerPort}'
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				CurrentState=ReadState/> 
				</NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks 
				TargetMachine=${DEPLOYSHARDEDMONGODBCLUSTER:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created      
				ConfigServerHostnames=${DEPLOYSHARDEDMONGODBCLUSTER:ConfigServerHostnames}
				Host=${DEPLOYSHARDEDMONGODBCLUSTER:Host}
				User=${DEPLOYSHARDEDMONGODBCLUSTER:User}
				Lib=RUNCOMMAND
				Command='sudo mongos --fork --syslog --configdb ${DEPLOYSHARDEDMONGODBCLUSTER:ConfigServerHostnames}:${DEPLOYSHARDEDMONGODBCLUSTER:ConfigServerPort}'
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				CurrentState=ReadState/> 
				</NewBlock>
